summary: A genie turned mortal after his many failures is sent to Baghdad. As his last chance to prove himself he must help a prince and princess fulfill a prophecy.
cast: Dick Shawn|Diane Baker|Barry Coe|John Van Dreelen|Robert F. Simon|Vaughn Taylor|Michael David|Stanley Adams|William Edmonson|Fred Scheiwiller|Stan Molek|Mark Bailey|William Baskin|Don Beddoe|Michael Burns|Malcolm Cassell|Linden Chiles|Ann Del Guercio|Gregg Dunn|Joey Faye|Kelton Garwood|Kim Hamilton|Sam Harris|Joy Hilton|Stan Kamber|Buddy Lewis|Frank Logan|Eve McVeagh|Ernesto Molinari|Bill Mumy|Alena Murray|Jack Orrison|Joe Patridge|Hortense Petra|Harry Raybould|Rick Vallin|Leslie Wenner
title: The Wizard of Baghdad
